6643ec99be9f66e44f001e8b.Name: Rusty Bucket
6643ec99be9f66e44f001e8b.Description: This helmet is so rusty, it's practically a colander. But don't worry, it's still perfectly good at stopping bullets. Well, most bullets. At least some of the time. Forged from the finest 10mm thick steel by an unknown scav

6643ecd08d75026930377700.Name: Cardboard Helmet
6643ecd08d75026930377700.Description: This trusty, but definitely not certified, cardboard helmet offers about as much protection as a wet napkin against a bullet. However, it's surprisingly stylish and sure to turn heads (and maybe get you shot). Perfect for the budget-conscious PMC. Disclaimer: This helmet does not guarantee your survival against any form of weaponry. Use at your own risk (and amusement).

6643ed2f0a29d69de8322986.Name: Stahlhelm M42 helmet
6643ed2f0a29d69de8322986.Description: This authentic Stahlhelm M42 helmet offers vintage protection with modern-day coolness. Originally used by the Wehrmacht, this helmet is now a favorite among collectors and historical reenactors.

6643ed580ce419e213af4bb6.Name: Glock 21 .45ACP pistol
6643ed580ce419e213af4bb6.Description: Glock 21 is an Austrian pistol designed by Glock company. Thanks to both its impressive combat characteristics and reliablity it gained wide recognition and popularity as a police, shooting sports and civilian self-defense weapon.

6643ee01b29cc64afcf75319.Name: Glock 21 MOS slide
6643ee01b29cc64afcf75319.Description: The MOS (Modular Optic System) slide designed for Glock .45 ACP pistols. Manufactured by Glock.

6643ee15904b58e0c01ce7c9.Name: Glock 21 slide
6643ee15904b58e0c01ce7c9.Description: The standard slide for Glock 21 .45 ACP pistol. Manufactured by Glock.

6643ee514aea715a45dcdcf0.Name: Glock .45 ACP Moto Cut pistol slide
6643ee514aea715a45dcdcf0.Description: A lightweight slide for Glock .45 ACP pistols.

6643ee68577d5b66d8fd2da7.Name: Glock .45 ACP Viper Cut pistol slide
6643ee68577d5b66d8fd2da7.Description: A lightweight slide for Glock .45 ACP pistols.

6643ee79e45ef6d6bdd29ab9.Name: Glock Lone Wolf AlphaWolf pistol slide for Glock 21
6643ee79e45ef6d6bdd29ab9.Description: A slide for Glock pistols family, manufactured by Lone Wolf.

6643ee8f6885b0044c27577e.Name: Polymer80 PS9 Glock slide
6643ee8f6885b0044c27577e.Description: A slide for Glock pistols family, manufactured by Polymer80.

6643ee9fe4dfba4d267e83f4.Name: Glock ZEV Tech HEX Gen3 RMR pistol slide
6643ee9fe4dfba4d267e83f4.Description: A slide for Glock pistols family, manufactured by ZEV Technologies. Includes a mount for installation of the RMR reflex sights lineup.

6643eeb545c5f5338100a60b.Name: Glock ZEV Tech Spartan Gen3 RMR pistol slide
6643eeb545c5f5338100a60b.Description: A slide for Glock pistols family, manufactured by ZEV Technologies. Includes a mount for installation of the RMR reflex sights lineup.

6643ec0844e8ddc0fe957346.Name: Glock Lone Wolf AlphaWolf Threaded Barrel for Glock 21
6643ec0844e8ddc0fe957346.Description: A threaded barrel for .45 ACP pistols of the Glock family. Manufactured by Lone Wolf.

6643ec222eef833707e25e5b.Name: Glock .45 ACP Double Diamond threaded barrel
6643ec222eef833707e25e5b.Description: A threaded barrel for .45 ACP pistols of Glock family. Manufactured by Double Diamond.

6643ec38b387e27510f05cfa.Name: Glock .45 ACP Compensated barrel
6643ec38b387e27510f05cfa.Description: A compensated barrel for .45 ACP pistols of Glock family. Manufactured by Glock.

6643ec507b741df851a9c424.Name: Glock .45 ACP Salient Arms Threaded barrel
6643ec507b741df851a9c424.Description: A threaded barrel for .45 ACP pistols of Glock family. Manufactured by Salient Arms.

6643ec695cfe222e012e32c1.Name: Glock .45 ACP Standard barrel
6643ec695cfe222e012e32c1.Description: A standard barrel for .45 ACP pistols of Glock family. Manufactured by Glock.

6643ef74cba98a5c84b9121c.Name: VKS Vykhlop 12.7x55 Sniper Rifle
6643ef74cba98a5c84b9121c.Description: The 12.7×55mm VKS silenced sniper rifle is intended for special operations that require silent firing and penetration much superior to that provided by 9×39mm VSS silenced sniper rifle. Typical targets for the VKS are combatants in heavy body armor or behind cover. The weapon uses an integral suppressor.

6643ef4f859db3d8379b5eaf.Name: Vykhlop Integral Supressor
6643ef4f859db3d8379b5eaf.Description: Integral Supressor for VKS Vykhlop Sniper Rifle

6643efaa05ac5da670fea726.Name: 5 Round Magazine for VKS Vykhlop Sniper rifle
6643efaa05ac5da670fea726.Description: 5 Round Polymer Magazine for VKS Vykhlop 12.7x55 Sniper Rifle

6643eec83b2c9104e74c0bef.Name: 12.7x55 STs-130
6643eec83b2c9104e74c0bef.Description: The 12.7×55mm cartridge is used in some Russian firearms such as VKS bullpup sniper rifle. The cartridge can carry a projectile weighing between from 108 grains and 1173 grains and is predominantly used to fire heavy subsonic loads. The high penetration VKS round can penetrate up to 16 mm (0.63 in) of steel at 200 metres (220 yd) or body armor up to GOST 5 or NIJ III at 100 metres (110 yd). The accuracy of this cartridge when loaded with precision VKS bullets is claimed to be one MOA at 100 metres (110 yd) up to the effective range limit of 600 metres (660 yd).[1] Despite being chambered in the same cartridge, the ShAK-12 would not be able to feed or chamber rounds designed for the VKS due to significant length differences in the bullet component of the cartridge and thus requires its own, shorter, loads. The ShAK-12 rounds have less range compared to the VKS with the maximum effective range of the loads reaching in between 100 and 300 metres (110 and 330 yd)

6643ef279e9ebaa4d8fc604d.Name: 12.7x55 STs-130VPS
6643ef279e9ebaa4d8fc604d.Description: The 12.7×55mm cartridge is used in some Russian firearms such as VKS bullpup sniper rifle. Compared to the STs-130, the STs-130VPS (СЦ-130ВПС) has increased penetration thanks to the 76 gram bullet. A little corroded and dirty

6643eef81ba9a68596e12846.Name: 12.7x55 STs-130PT2
6643eef81ba9a68596e12846.Description: The 12.7×55mm cartridge is used in some Russian firearms such as VKS bullpup sniper rifle. Compared to the STs-130, the STs-130PT2 (СЦ-130ПТ2) has increased accuracy thanks to the solid bronze bullet.

6643eb33e6a42c5684471906.Name: .50 Beowulf FMJ
6643eb33e6a42c5684471906.Description: The .50 Beowulf is a rifle cartridge developed by Bill Alexander of Alexander Arms for use in a modified AR-15 rifle. The cartridge utilizes a rebated rim, sized to match the rim of the 7.62×39mm and 6.5mm Grendel rounds.

6642b6b15d80dec030dafa7a.Name: .50 Beowulf HP
6642b6b15d80dec030dafa7a.Description: The .50 Beowulf is a rifle cartridge developed by Bill Alexander of Alexander Arms for use in a modified AR-15 rifle. The cartridge utilizes a rebated rim, sized to match the rim of the 7.62×39mm and 6.5mm Grendel rounds. The round is intended to improve stopping power greatly at short to medium-range as compared to the standard 5.56×45mm NATO round thanks to the hollow point.

6643ea180814e77a3a18db58.Name: .50 Beowulf Hydra-Shok JHP
6643ea180814e77a3a18db58.Description: The .50 Beowulf is a rifle cartridge developed by Bill Alexander of Alexander Arms for use in a modified AR-15 rifle. The cartridge utilizes a rebated rim, sized to match the rim of the 7.62×39mm and 6.5mm Grendel rounds. The round is intended to improve stopping power greatly at short to medium-range as compared to the standard 5.56×45mm NATO round thanks to the jacketed hollow point.

6643eb62ef9aaed4947a9836.Name: .700 Nitro Express FMJ
6643eb62ef9aaed4947a9836.Description: The .700 Nitro Express (17.8×89mmR) is a big game rifle cartridge made by Holland & Holland, London, England. It was developed in 1988 by Jim Bell and William Feldstein and built by H&H. The recoil is substantial, and the rifle is only available from H&H as a bespoke item. The .700 Nitro Express is a straight rimmed cartridge designed for use in single-shot and double rifles.

6643edda4a05be2737da3134.Name: MP-700 .700 Nitro Express Double Rifle
6643edda4a05be2737da3134.Description: The MP-700 is a double-barreled rifle chambered in .700 Nitro Express. It is a break-action rifle with two barrels. The rifle is equipped with open sights. The rifle is intended for hunting dangerous animals.

6643ec7e9f7598f9f556b493.Name: MP-700 .700 Nitro Express Double Rifle Barrel
6643ec7e9f7598f9f556b493.ShortName: MP-700 .700 Nitro Express Double Rifle Barrel
6643ec7e9f7598f9f556b493.Description: A 750mm long .700 Nitro Express barrel for MP-700 double-barreled rifle. Because of the pressure of the .700 Nitro Express cartridge, the barrel is extremely heavy. Manufactured by Holland & Holland.

6643eba54a3c851618b1c786.Name: AR-15 .50 Beowulf 18 inch barrel
6643eba54a3c851618b1c786.Description: 18 inches barrel for AR-15 based systems for 50 Beowulf ammo. Made by SSK Industries.

6643ecf874882999e95e926c.Name: Colt .50 Beowulf Assault Rifle
6643ecf874882999e95e926c.Description: The Colt AR in .50 Beowulf is a gas operated, rifle with a rotating bolt, actuated by direct impingement gas operation. It is based on the standard AR-15 rifle, but with a heavy barrel, modified bolt, and 12.7x42mmRB magazines. The rifle is capable of firing all .50 Beowulf ammunition types.

6643ed1864892fae7fa9df0b.Name: MK12 Low Profile Gas Block
6643ed1864892fae7fa9df0b.Description: MK12 Low Profile Gas Block for AR-15 based systems. Made specific for .50 Beowulf ammo.

6643ed70bf869eb9f52881eb.Name: Alexander Arms 15.8 inch handguard
6643ed70bf869eb9f52881eb.Description: Alexander Arms 15.8 inch handguard made by Alexander Arms for AR-15 based systems for 50 Beowulf ammo.

6643ed867ca1c85e01d78c4a.Name: 10-round .50 Beowulf magazine
6643ed867ca1c85e01d78c4a.Description: 10-round .50 Beowulf magazine for AR-15 based systems for .50 Beowulf ammo. Because of the size of the .50 Beowulf cartridge, the magazine is limited to 10 rounds.

6643edefd1f151dad20e840e.Name: AR-15 Vltor MUR-1S .50 beowulf upper receiver
6643edefd1f151dad20e840e.ShortName: AR-15 Vltor MUR-1S .50 beowulf upper receiver
6643edefd1f151dad20e840e.Description: The MUR-1S modular upper receiver for AR-based weapons, manufactured by Vltor. Fitted with mounts for attaching additional equipment.

6643ed9bd8da456ea6f394dc.Name: SVT-40 Tokarev Custom mount
6643ed9bd8da456ea6f394dc.Description: Custom SVT-40 7.62x54R mount made by Kiba Arms.
